nodes.text: @paul_t_miller Well I'm English so...and this may sound harsh, but I don't really care all that much. It's literally nothing to do with us & I'm just not interested in US politics to that degree
paul would likely endeavor to find the good reasons the fha excluded Black people from securing home loans just to maintain objectivity \n\nhttps://t.co/wkuYqDgNn3 https://t.co/1tVMmLVcyA
